document.title: Hello World - My First Blog Post
document.description: Welcome to my blog! In this post, I'll share my thoughts on modern web development and the tools I use.

body.raw:
# Hello World!

Welcome to my blog! I'm excited to share my thoughts and experiences with you about modern web development, design, and technology.

## Why I Started This Blog

I believe in sharing knowledge and learning from the community. This blog is my way of giving back and documenting my journey as a developer.

## My Tech Stack

Here's a code snippet showing my current tech stack:

```typescript
const techStack = {
  frontend: {
    framework: 'Next.js',
    language: 'TypeScript',
    styling: 'Tailwind CSS',
    animations: 'Framer Motion'
  },
  backend: {
    runtime: 'Node.js',
    database: 'PostgreSQL',
    orm: 'Prisma'
  },
  deployment: {
    platform: 'Vercel',
    cdn: 'Cloudflare'
  }
};
```

## What's Next?

I plan to write about:

1. Modern React patterns
2. Performance optimization
3. Developer experience
4. UI/UX design principles

Stay tuned for more content!

> "The best way to learn is to teach." - Frank Oppenheimer
